AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned shaman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After an unsuccessful ritual that coincided with a devastating hurricane, the tribe lost faith in [PAWN_nameDef] power. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} narrowly escaped reprisals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cult priest
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal cult minister. It is {PAWN_gender ? he : she} who is responsible for the correct performance of the rituals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] reads many scrolls and manuscripts, eventually becoming the most intelligent person in the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life in military campaigns, capturing the enemies of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Astrologer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life in military campaigns, capturing the enemies of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chronicler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] engaged in the compilation of temporary chronicles of the life of the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tanner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works with leather and deals with its processing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Forest killer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is renowned in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} excellent bow skill. [PAWN_nameDef] never returns home without prey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bricklayer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] specializes in stone processing and home construction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Squire
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at weapons, having spent {PAWN_gender ? his : her} entire life in military campaigns.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Field Priest
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After [PAWN_nameDef] became high priest, the tribe began a fierce war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to raise morale through rituals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle Shaman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is proficient in weapons and ancient spells. According to legends, it is they who {PAWN_gender ? he : she} lp the tribe to win battles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ruthless predator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There seems to be nothing human left in him. [PAWN_nameDef] is ruthless and cruel when it comes to fighting within the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spellcaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sincerely believes in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} strength, like [PAWN_nameDef]'s fellow tribesmen. According to legend, [PAWN_nameDef] is able to stop a tornado with just one word.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Milkman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] breeds cows and muffalo for milk, which is considered valuable in [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Boatman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] and {PAWN_gender ? his : her} family build boats and small rafts for the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Leader's slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave for the {PAWN_gender ? he : she} ad of the tribe, but escaped during a battle with foreigners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slave leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] and {PAWN_gender ? his : her} friends were all their lives slaves of cruel masters who did not expect them to take up arms.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exiled Avenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was expelled from the tribe in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} youth for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} violent disposition and irreconcilable character. [PAWN_nameDef] took revenge on all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} offenders and found refuge in the remote mountains.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Potter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys crafting tableware for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribal community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Traveler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life alone, exploring the planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a good and pleasant voice which {PAWN_gender ? he : she} lps {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to cheer up [PAWN_nameDef]'s fellow tribesmen before a fight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is adept at blacksmithing and making weapons for [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Forest hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] hunts big game in the forest for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nature lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves the world around {PAWN_gender ? him : her} and the wildlife with all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} soul, not allowing the thought of killing or destroying this harmony.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Head hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] takes pleasure in killing people. [PAWN_nameDef] often keeps close to nomadic tribes, taking food from them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Seaman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lives on a small ship on which {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe travels.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Northern
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has lived {PAWN_gender ? his : her} entire adult life in the north, breeding deer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desert dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All {PAWN_gender ? his : her} adult life [PAWN_nameDef] has been in the desert and has adapted to life in it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All {PAWN_gender ? his : her} adult life [PAWN_nameDef] has been in the wasteland and has adapted to life in it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle rider
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fights bravely astride {PAWN_gender ? his : her} beloved pet - the huge elephant Winston.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cave guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] guards the peace of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe, which has settled in a deep network of caves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warchief's guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always served with faith and truth to {PAWN_gender ? his : her} leader, saving {PAWN_gender ? him : her} from conspiracies and troubles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cave dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a huge network of underground caves with {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wanderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: For a long time [PAWN_nameDef] has been wandering the world in search of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} destiny, having left [PAWN_nameDef]'s own tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Legendary Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] subtly appears in front of the enemy at the right moment, each time deciding the outcome of the battle in favor of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lore keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the source of the tribe's knowledge, knowing numerous recipes and rituals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Winemaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has long been involved in growing vines and preparing wine for [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribal community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] travels with a tribal caravan and sells slaves to everyone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Baker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life [PAWN_nameDef] works in a small hut on the outskirts of the tribe and bakes bread from flour.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] builds stone buildings for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribal community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering merchant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] prefers to walk alone or surrounded by pack animals, moving from one settlement to another and engaging in trade.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] creates barrels and other wood products for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe, sometimes trading.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scribe
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is engaged in rewriting books and scrolls of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe, thus preserving ancient knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Carpenter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master when it comes to working with wood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beekeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] breeds bees and produces honey for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rhetorician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is proficient in speech and is able to inspire any member of the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Digger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is involved in building and leveling surfaces for various jobs in the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Horse archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mobile and agile fighter of a warlike tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Woodcutter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lives a short distance from the tribal center, deforestation and planting new trees.
